title: Unapologetic | When Christian Leaders Fail
itunes:title: Unapologetic | When Christian Leaders Fail
description: Addressing questions such as: Does exposed sin have an impact on the arguments or the teaching of the leader? Are they somehow discredited? What is the impact on the victims when a congregation is left feeling hopeless and betrayed, having a hard time trusting, and victims of assault? On reflection, what are some of the warning signs that led to Bobby's relapse?
